articles.title: Pulse oximeters: What to know about whether you need one - msnNOW
articles.description: Sales and search interest in the medical devices, which measure the saturation of oxygen in red blood cells, have spiked in recent weeks.
articles.content:
Many patients with severe cases of Covid-19 have been shown to have extremely low levels of oxygen in the blood. Others who have tested positive find themselves experiencing shortness of breath.
